mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNum, c.itemNum, c.price, c.quantity, c.memberID, i.itemNum,i.goods, GROUP_CONCAT(a.itemAttachNum) fnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachParentsNum) pnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachName) fnames, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileSize) fsizes, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileContentType) contenttypes FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN item i ON c.itemNum = i.itemNum LEFT OUTER JOIN itemAttach a ON i.itemNum = a.itemAttachParentsNum WHERE c.memberID = #{memberID} GROUP BY c.cartNum ORDER BY c.cartNum DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity=#{quantity} WHERE cartNum=#{cartNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE memberID=#{memberID} AND itemNum=#{itemNum}
